pages.title: ⎧ Queen of Wands ⎧
pages.text: Queen of the Thrones of Flame$(br)      ∇ Water of ∆ Fire

The Queen of Wands sits upon a throne decorated with lions facing opposing directions, a symbol of fire and strength. She stares intently ahead as if in amazement at the world.$(br)  In her left hand and behind her are sunflowers, solar symbols of fertility and joy; her right hand holds a wand with small sprouts springing to life.$(br)  A black cat sits at her feet, signifying boldness, intuitive understanding, and luck;

qualities of being in touch with the unconscious mind.$(br)  She represents the development of awareness of our own role in the world.$(br)  We can describe her as the mystical contemplation of the Fire of life.$(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Wonderment, joy, success.$(br)  May signify someone positive with a deep sense of the astonishment of life.
$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Opposition, jealousy.$(br)  Can be someone jaded, negative, needing to be shaken up.
